record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 09, 2008)

[Page: S2825]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Bill Hutzel, a fellow in my office, be granted floor privileges for the duration of debate on H.R. 3221.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Ben Brown, a fellow in my office, be allowed the privilege of the floor for the remainder of the debate on the housing bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
